# Prismatic Deluge (Spell)
## Overview
[[Evocation Spells|Evocation]]

**Level:** [[9th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 9]], [[9th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 9]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 19th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 19]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Medium (100 ft. + 10 ft./level)

**Area:** Cylinder (40-ft. radius, 80-ft. high)

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** See text

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Complete Mage (WotC), pg. 114

*In a blinding shower of light, you call an enormous, painfully bright rainbow from the heavens.*

This spell produces a column of colors resembling the end of a rainbow. Every creature in the area is affected as though by the *[[Prismatic Spray (Spell)|prismatic spray]]* spell: [[Blinded|blinded]] for 2d4 rounds if 8 HD or fewer, and you roll 1d8 on the *[[Prismatic Spray (Spell)|prismatic spray]]* table to see what color affects which target.
